about_the_game:
Choose your class

Naked with a stick? Armor to protect you? Daggers with poison?
Choose how you want to face your phobias and destroy them all!!
Each class has different stats and unique abilities!

Explore and collect

Enter into your mind and navigate through the vast network of neurons.
Get items that will improve your character to free them from your phobias and get rewards for it.
Discover secrets, hidden places and make friends along the way!

Meet friends

Everyone knows that adventures are always more bearable if you are accompanied by people willing to help you.
You will find the best professionals that will make your way easier.
I won’t lie to you though. If you want to get help there is always a price you will have to pay.

Fight your phobias

Free your mind from your worst phobias!
Fight against them in a frantic turn-based combat!
Now you attack! Now they attack! You again! Them again! Unbelievable!
Dodge all the attacks they throw at you with your great moving skills!
Move from side to side, jump, dash, cling to the wall, do whatever it takes to avoid being hit!

Status Effects

Poison, Burn, Freezing, Wet, Electrify and Bleeding.
Be careful not to be affected by any of them.
On the contrary! Apply all these states to your phobias and make your battle end much sooner.
Actually, you won’t be able to apply all of them.
Some have synergies, while others negate each other.

name: PhoboPhobia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Enter the depths of your mind in a 2D Roguelike – Dungeon Crawler game that will challenge your skills. Immerse yourself in a neural world, where you will face the worst phobias. Collect resources, items and meet people who will help you as you unravel the mysteries of your psyche.
